page.topic: Custom layout when in AbsoluteLayout container
page.description: If this control is inside an AbsoluteLayout container, do you want to position manually position each of the Radiobutton controls? You might want to do this if you are using a bitmap background for the AbsoluteLayout container.

section.note: This option is only shown if the choices for the Radiobutton are from a static list.

section.description: Make sure that the 'Label Position' for the control is set to 'None'.
